name: Izzy
physical_description: A young adult female with a light complexion, an oval face, and blue eyes, possibly of European descent. Her shoulder-length reddish-brown hair is straight with subtle highlights. She appears to be of average height with a slender build.
face_description: Oval face with feminine features, blue eyes, and possible European descent. Small nose, full lips. No distinctive features noted.
hair_description: Shoulder-length straight reddish-brown hair with subtle highlights.
